snippet: Understanding how young zebra finches acquire their courtship songs may shed light on how all brains learn.
abstract: Study in journal Science details brain changes that take place in male zebra finches as they learn courtship song from their fathers.
lead_paragraph: Understanding how young zebra finches acquire their courtship songs may shed light on how all brains learn.

headline.print_headline: Animal Behavior: Bird Brains: Smarter Than We Thought
headline.main: Bird Brains: Smarter Than We Thought
